title: Google Pixel XL no LTE or 4g on any network only H+
content:
Hi,

I have a Google Pixel XL that will not connect to LTE or 4G on any mobile network. I have tried it with Android 10 and 9 and still only H+. 

All of the settings are correct and I have tried flight mode, phone options through * code. My sim gets 4g in other phones but not my pixel.

Could my antenna or modem be faulty... I do get data just not LTE/4g

Thanks
